To join the event, become a supporting subscriber with a 50% discount — only $4 per month. Furthermore, we’re donating this week’s proceeds from new subscriptions to Railroad Workers United. This means your new subscription will not only support independent media and get you into this live event, but will also support railroad workers who are fighting for their rights.
